backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - Real API calls
original_prompt: Help me understand where I am spending my time and identify ways I can reclaim time to focus more on my top priorities.

gutts.name: Collect Calendar Data
gutts.capability: Retrieve and aggregate all calendar events from connected sources within a specified time range.
gutts.user_goal: Access complete historical and upcoming calendar data for analysis.
gutts.evidence: Successfully fetched events from Google Calendar and Outlook for the past 30 days.

gutts.name: Normalize Event Data
gutts.capability: Standardize event attributes (title, duration, category) across different calendar sources.
gutts.user_goal: Ensure all events are in a consistent format for accurate analysis.
gutts.evidence: Converted all event timestamps to UTC and standardized duration in minutes.

gutts.name: Classify Events by Category
gutts.capability: Assign each event to a category (e.g., meetings, focus work, personal) using rules or ML models.
gutts.user_goal: Understand the type of activities consuming time.
gutts.evidence: Labeled 80% of events as 'Meetings', 'Focus Work', or 'Personal' with 90% accuracy.

gutts.name: Calculate Time Spent per Category
gutts.capability: Aggregate total time spent in each event category over the selected period.
gutts.user_goal: Quantify time allocation across different activity types.
gutts.evidence: Generated a summary showing 20 hours in meetings, 10 hours in focus work, 5 hours personal.

gutts.name: Identify Top Priorities
gutts.capability: Determine user’s top priorities from explicit input or inferred from goals and recurring events.
gutts.user_goal: Clarify which activities align with the user’s main objectives.
gutts.evidence: Extracted top priorities as 'Project Alpha', 'Team Management', and 'Personal Health' from user input.

gutts.name: Compare Time Allocation to Priorities
gutts.capability: Analyze alignment between actual time spent and the user’s stated or inferred priorities.
gutts.user_goal: Reveal gaps between current time usage and desired focus areas.
gutts.evidence: Found only 15% of time spent on top priorities vs. 50% in low-value meetings.

gutts.name: Identify Low-Value or Non-Priority Time Blocks
gutts.capability: Detect events or categories that consume significant time but do not align with top priorities.
gutts.user_goal: Spot opportunities to reclaim time from less important activities.
gutts.evidence: Flagged 8 recurring meetings unrelated to top priorities totaling 6 hours weekly.

gutts.name: Generate Time Reallocation Suggestions
gutts.capability: Provide actionable recommendations to reduce low-value activities and increase time for priorities.
gutts.user_goal: Receive practical steps to free up time for high-priority tasks.
gutts.evidence: Suggested declining 3 recurring meetings and blocking 2-hour focus sessions twice a week.

gutts.name: Visualize Time Distribution
gutts.capability: Create a visual representation (chart or graph) of time spent by category and priority alignment.
gutts.user_goal: Easily understand time allocation patterns at a glance.
gutts.evidence: Displayed a pie chart showing 60% meetings, 30% focus work, 10% personal.
